resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103032</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103032</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205508</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">ESL: English Verbs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ESL: Englische Verben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ESL : Verbes Anglais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ESL: Verbos Ingleses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ESL: Verbi Inglesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ESL: Αγγλικά ρήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ESL: Verbos Ingleses</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learner of English as a second or foreign language can practice their verbs using multiple choice questions based on a bank of 78 pictures of actions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger von Englisch als zweites oder von 
Fremdsprache kann ihre Verben mit den mehrfachen auserlesenen Fragen 
üben, die auf einer Bank von 78 Abbildungen von Tätigkeiten 
basieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'étudiant de l'anglais en tant que deuxième ou 
de la langue étrangère peut pratiquer leurs verbes en utilisant des 
questions bien choisies multiples basées sur une banque de 78 images 
des actions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O learner do inglês como um segundo ou da língua
extrangeira pode praticar seus verbos usando as perguntas bem 
escolhidas múltiplas baseadas em um banco de 78 retratos das ações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il principiante dell'inglese come un secondo o 
della lingua straniera può esercitarsi nei loro verbi usando le 
domande choice multiple basate su una banca di 78 immagini delle
azioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αρχάριος των αγγλικών ως δεύτερη ή ξένη γλώσσα 
μπορεί να ασκήσει τα ρήματά τους χρησιμοποιώντας τις 
πολλαπλάσιες ερωτήσεις επιλογής βασισμένες σε μια τράπεζα 78 
εικόνων των ενεργειών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El principiante del inglés como segundo o del 
idioma extranjero puede practicar sus verbos usando las preguntas bien
escogidas múltiples basadas en una batería de 78 cuadros de 
acciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ALAN ESTES
FN:ALAN ESTES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205508</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103032</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/esl-english-verbs</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
